titles.title: RAISE Act
RAISE Act
Respect, Advancement, and Increasing Support for Educators Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a refundable tax credit for certain teachers as a supplement to State effort to provide teachers with a livable wage, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Respect, Advancement, and Increasing Support for Educators Act or the RAISE Act
This bill allows a refundable tax credit for elementary or secondary school teachers or early childhood educators in schools with a certain poverty rate, increases the tax deduction for the expenses of elementary and secondary school teachers, and provides funding for local educational agencies that maintain or increase teacher salaries.
